W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: After walking through the stone gate, you find yourself in Miyako City, former capital of the East Islands. Is the mysterious man who appeared the key to obtaining another triangle?

W01_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTTOWN_BATTLE_100_DETAI.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_BOFO_GHOSTTOWN_BATTLE_100_DETAI.text: The mysterious man said you would obtain a triangle by fighting evil spirits. Could this be one of them?

W01_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_BATTLE_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_BATTLE_100_DETAIL.text: The mysterious man said you would obtain a triangle by fighting phantoms. Could this be one of them?

W01_EVAR_BOFO_OOIKE_BATTLE_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_BOFO_OOIKE_BATTLE_100_DETAIL.text: The mysterious man said you would obtain a triangle by fighting phantoms. Could this be one of them?

W01_EVAR_BOFO_BRIDGE_BATTLE_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_BOFO_BRIDGE_BATTLE_100_DETAIL.text: The mysterious man said you would obtain a triangle by fighting evil spirits. Could this be one of them?
